Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameScreen

  • public class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the main game screen

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
          int size,
          int high)
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame being manipulated
        size - The size of the maze, 1 = easy, 2 = med, 3 = hard
        high - The high score so far from previous attempts
